nodes.text: Epic Collection is an imprint by Marvel Comics used to reprint large quantities of comics in trade paperback collections. Currently, ongoing Star Wars Legends Epic Collections are reprinting all the Legends comics put out by Marvel Comics, Dark Horse Comics, and other publishers. Each collection is curated to contain comics in chronological order, including stories from the Star Wars Tales line and the Star Wars: Visionaries graphic novel, instead of being arranged thematically like the previous Star Wars Omnibuses from Dark Horse Comics. Some Epic Collections have been combined to create even larger hardcover  Marvel Omnibuses.
Infinities is out of continuity with the other volumes since the stories in the collection are part of alternate versions of the Star Wars universe.
